title: Build ComposableGraphIndex from MemoryBlocks
goal: Allow graph traversal and type-aware query expansion based on block links.
action_items: [ ] Ensure `memory_block_to_node` (Task 2.4) correctly populates Node `relationships` or metadata for links.
[ ] Create a list of `Node` objects representing sample linked blocks (e.g., a project node linked to task nodes).
[ ] Add the Nodes (with their relationship info) to the graph index.
[ ] Write a sample query that utilizes graph traversal (e.g., 'Find all tasks related to project X').
[ ] Research LlamaIndex methods for graph traversal querying (`graph.query`, `graph.get_related_nodes`, etc.).
test_criteria: Verify that the query correctly returns nodes based on the defined relationships (e.g., traversing from a project node returns its linked task nodes).
